医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
用于糖尿病治疗的香料草药：以粗草和茴香为主宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表一篇新文章。糖尿病 (DM) 是由一系列因素引起的，主要源于胰腺胰岛素分泌缺陷和胰岛素抵抗的出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Spice-herbs-for-diabetes-treatment-A-focus-on-Trachyspermum-ammi-and-Pimpinella-anisum.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Spice-herbs-for-diabetes-treatment-A-focus-on-Trachyspermum-ammi-and-Pimpinella-anisum.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c84a60e-9cfd-44c0-bf0c-3af3fd92c18e Mon, 25 Sep 2023 12:55:28 -0400 Spice herbs for diabetes treatment: A focus on Trachyspermum ammi and Pimpinella anisum
包含预防保健建议的新指南旨在促进加拿大的健康公平一项包含 16 项预防保健建议的综合性新指南旨在促进因种族主义、性别歧视和其他形式的歧视而处于不利地位的人们的健康公平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/New-guideline-with-preventive-care-recommendations-aims-to-promote-health-equity-in-Canada.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/New-guideline-with-preventive-care-recommendations-aims-to-promote-health-equity-in-Canada.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5811e693-bce8-4d69-a9be-47e27e2c5c9c Mon, 25 Sep 2023 12:50:41 -0400 New guideline with preventive care recommendations aims to promote health equity in Canada
研究人员破解了罕见肾癌的遗传密码首次研究了一种罕见肾癌（称为肾素瘤）的遗传密码。在今天（9 月 25 日）《自然通讯》杂志上发表的新论文中，威康桑格研究所、大奥蒙德街医院和皇家自由医院的研究人员还揭示了一种新的药物靶点，如果不建议手术，该药物靶点可以作为替代治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Researchers-crack-the-genic-code-of-rare-form-of-kidney-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Researchers-crack-the-genic-code-of-rare-form-of-kidney-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4feb3f47-6f29-43b3-84e9-a2f54ba030a2 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 12:46:15 -0400 Researchers crack the genetic code of rare form of kidney cancer
研究人员开发出更安全地输送强效抗生素药物的新方法抗生素耐药细菌对人类生命构成威胁，但治疗细菌感染的新药开发进展缓慢。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Researchers-develop-new-method-to-deliver-strong-antibiotic-drugs-more-safely.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Researchers-develop-new-method-to-deliver-strong-antibiotic-drugs-more-safely.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=981dc37d-1c29-4e2a-9597-3ba3ba02b42a Mon, 25 Sep 2023 12:37:12 -0400 Researchers develop new method to deliver strong antibiotic drugs more safely
研究发现芽殖酵母新的内吞途径内吞作用是细胞内化水和营养物质等物质的重要细胞过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Study-discovers-a-new-endocytic-pathway-in-budding-yeast.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Study-discovers-a-new-endocytic-pathway-in-budding-yeast.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf9fd7d5-d689-4b86-9bd9-0327082c3393 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 12:30:07 -0400 Study discovers a new endocytic pathway in budding yeast
新模型为理解和预防家族性癫痫中的 SUDEP 铺平了道路密歇根大学的研究人员开发了一种用于研究一种家族性癫痫的模型，为理解并最终瞄准导致该疾病及其相关死亡的机制打开了大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/New-model-paves-way-to-understanding-and-preventing-SUDEP-in-familial-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/New-model-paves-way-to-understanding-and-preventing-SUDEP-in-familial-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdb2d984-a5a0-4961-ab94-27420911ade9 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 12:21:02 -0400 New model paves way to understanding and preventing SUDEP in familial epilepsy

芬兰研究发现修订后的痴呆症指南并未减少精神药物的使用最近的一项基于登记的研究调查了芬兰 2017 年发布的修订版痴呆症治疗临床指南对 2009-2020 年痴呆症老年人精神药物使用者趋势的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Finnish-study-finds-revised-dementia-guidelines-did-not-reduce-psychotropic-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Finnish-study-finds-revised-dementia-guidelines-did-not-reduce-psychotropic-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8b27ef2-f40f-4b66-b947-2af939693ad7 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 10:05:28 -0400 Finnish study finds revised dementia guidelines did not reduce psychotropic use
